header.tagline: AI-Powered Real-Time Royalty & Revenue Split Solution

hero.title: Stop Deleting Videos. Start Using Legal Audio.
hero.subtitle: The world's first pack-based audio utility marketplace for short-form creators. Viral hooks, meme reactions, and brand kits — all copyright-safe.

artists.title: Built for Creators. Monetized for Artists.
artists.subtitle: Founded by Victor Joseph Edet, CEO of Victor360 Brand Limited. The only platform packaging performance audio for TikTok, Reels, Ads & UGC.

artist1.name: DJ SynthWave
artist1.quote: V3B gave me direct access to content creators worldwide. My neon-soaked synthwave tracks are now powering YouTube videos, podcasts, and streaming content.

artist2.name: BeatsMaster
artist2.quote: Urban beats that hit hard. I upload my tracks, set my price, and creators license them instantly. Finally, fair pay for my craft.

artist3.name: LoFi Producer
artist3.quote: My chill lo-fi beats help students focus and creators relax their audiences. Simple licensing, instant payouts, no hassle.
